Videos

{{ video.title }}

{{ video.description }}

Categories: {{ video.categories }}

Watch
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Video } from 'src/app/interfaces/video.model'; import { VideoService } from 'src/app/services/video.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { videos: Video[] = []; serverUrl = 'http://127.0.0.1:8080/'; videoFilePath = ''; constructor(private videoService: VideoService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.videoService.getAllVideos().subscribe((data) => { this.videos = data.map(video => ({ ...video, thumbnail: this.serverUrl + 'Thumbnails/' + video.thumbnail, })); }); } }
